## Runtime.ReadOnlyValidatingResourceTreeCollection class

Implementation of a validating resource tree collection that validates string inputs.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class ReadOnlyValidatingResourceTreeCollection<T> implements IReadOnlyValidatingResourceTreeCollection<T> 
```
